welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Agui, Japan! Prepare to be enchanted by the city's rich history, stunning natural beauty, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Agui has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration with a valid email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Komaki AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Komaki AFB Airport, handling all cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
